title: France panorama. [No. 65/23]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. L’Europe on marche - economic summit between English Prime Minister, Edward Heath, and the French President. 2. Technique - new waterways and converting earth and rock into liquid gases. 3. Bibliotheque pilote - a new state of the art library . 4. Un Prix Nobel a Pasteur - a Nobel prize winner at the Pasteur Institute of Science. 5. Les ailes et la musique - wings and music.
